name: magic-guard

effect.black_white: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.black_2_white_2: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

flavor_text.black_white: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
